TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述剖析控制項，而是只是一個預留位置，該控制項的設計階段版本建立在設計介面上。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control, which is just a placeholder, is created on the design surface. 當您切換回來源檢視，請設計階段控制項，其中包括中的屬性值**屬性**方格中，會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control, which includes the values of the properties in the **Properties** grid, is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何擴充類別。The first demonstrates how to extend the class. 第二個示範如何以衍生一份類別，並將它與設計工具產生關聯。The second demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with a designer. 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 程式碼會改變預留位置代表設計介面上的控制項，並將屬性加入至**屬性**方格。The code alters the placeholder that represents the control on the design surface and adds a property to the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生一份類別，並將它與前一個範例中所定義的設計工具產生關聯。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with the designer that was defined in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#2)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯的預留位置設計介面上的控制項。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates a placeholder for the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFile : string with get, set

summary.span: Implements a designer property to shadow the property of the associated control.

span.span: Implements a designer property to shadow the property of the associated control.

value.span: A ，其中包含名稱和資料檔案的路徑相關聯。

span.span: A that contains the name and path of the data file associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定設計工具中的名稱和包含 Microsoft Access 資料庫的.mdb 檔案路徑用於相關聯的屬性控制項。Set the property in the designer to the name and path of the .mdb file containing the Microsoft Access database to use for the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示相關聯的存取資料檔案的路徑與名稱控制項預留位置，在設計階段中的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property to display the name and path of the Access data file that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

summary.span: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.

span.span: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.

returns.span: A that contains the design-time connection string for the associated .

span.span: A that contains the design-time connection string for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法對應至設計工具的站台，然後使用控制項的屬性產生連接字串的控制項屬性。The method maps the property of the control to the designer site, and then uses the property of the control to generate the connection string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以顯示 Microsoft Access 資料庫的連接字串相關聯控制項預留位置，在設計階段中的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the method to display the connection string of the Microsoft Access database that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

param.name: properties
param.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

span.span: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自陰影各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並且將它們，加入屬性，或移除方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid. 如控制項，方法會建立設計階段陰影的屬性控制項的屬性。For the control, the method creates the design-time property to shadow the property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以進行屬性為唯讀並顯示於 **屬性**方格。The following code example shows how to override the method to make the property read-only and visible in the **Properties** grid. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)]

span.para: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入至設計階段屬性集合，或變更其屬性。請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。
Override the method to add properties to the design-time property collection or change their attributes. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
